content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Specifying Labels as Report Targets You generate custom reports for endpoints that have been assigned custom labels or auto-label rules by specifying the labels as targets for one-time reports or scheduled reports. For more information, see Reports Overview. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
